description:
"Disaster Dollars" author Jim Jaffe shares his knowledge about financial disaster assistance programs and tips to prepare and protect your finances before disaster strikes. The course is separated into several sections and is specifically useful for for individuals and families (especially renters and home owners), local governments, business owners, and farmers. Course content includes several video lessons that can be watched on-the-go and at your own pace with the Udemy mobile app.

Join the discussions to interact with other students, and tweet about it with #disasterdollars and provide feedback to @safeandready.
title: "Financial Emergency Preparation & Recovery" with Jim Jaffe
